replies.body:
My brother found it on a server list

I don't really have one anymore, but I guess Throwbacka me back when the hubs were simple and didn't have crazy slab and stair combos with trees and structures and shit.

March 23rd 2015

It's fun, but later kinda becomes a burden, then becomes fun again, etc. We get bashed a lot, but we get used to it. I've made a lot of friends while being one.

You seem to really  like the forums and always seem to be on. Practically every post that has ever been made has a comment from you, xD.
